body:
It's not "leaked", but it does initialize the current device. We could avoid this by setting the current device in [THPTensor_(select)](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/77035d151e08f7aee97689cf1f29bbf8a968a61e/torch/csrc/generic/methods/Tensor.cwrap#L207).

However, there are a bunch of other calls that initialize the current device too, some of which would be hard to fix.
